frame.name: Contrition
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Experiencer</fen> feels bad about a choice, an <fen>Action</fen>, or a failure to do something, which they now consider to have been a mistake or wrong. The emotional state of the <fen>Experiencer</fen> may be showing in gestures or facial expressions, viz. an <fen>Expressor</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Experiencer">Smithers</fex> did not <t>repent</t> <fex name="Action">of his crime</fex>.</ex> <ex>It is God who rejoices at the <t>repentance</t> <fex name="Experiencer">of his sinner</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Experiencer
FE.definition:
<def-root>The FE <fen>Experiencer</fen> indicates the person who experiences the emotion about their prior action.
<ex><fex name="Experiencer">Smithers</fex> was contrite about his wrongdoings.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Action
FE.definition:
<def-root>The FE <fen>Action</fen> marks expressions that indicate a prior action that the <fen>Experiencer</fen> has come to feel bad about.
<ex>They confessed and <t>repented</t> <fex name="Action">their actions against the Soviet Union</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition:
<def-root>The FE <fen>Degree</fen> marks expressions that indicate how badly the <fen>Experiencer</fen> feels about their prior action.
<ex>Smithers was <fex name="Degree">very</fex> <t>contrite</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Expressor
FE.definition:
<def-root>The FE <fen>Expressor</fen> marks expressions that indicate a gesture or body part which is displaying the <fen>Emotional_state</fen> of the <fen>Experiencer</fen>.
<ex><t>Repentant</t> <fex name="Expressor">tears</fex> welled to his eyes.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Authenticity
FE.definition: <def-root>The FE <fen>Authenticity</fen> marks expressions that indicate whether the <fen>Experiencer</fen> genuinely feels contrite or just acts as if they did. <ex>The defendant showed no <fex name="Authenticity">real</fex> <t>remorse</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Emotional_state
FE.definition:
<def-root>The FE <fen>Emotional_state</fen> is modified by an adjective that indicates the <fen>Experiencer</fen> is contrite.
<ex>Martha had a <t>guilty</t> <fex name="Emotional_state">conscience</fex> after selling inferior merchandise.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Depictive
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE describes a participant of the state of affairs introduced by the target as being in some state during the action. The depicted state does not necessarily or usually facilitate or cause the state of affairs reported by the target.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> at which the <fen>Experiencer</fen> or the <fen>Expressor</fen> is contrite.</def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>The way in which the <fen>Experiencer</fen> or <fen>Expressor</fen> has contrition. </def-root>
